response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $12,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I propose a fair deal of $10,000. This price not only ensures a reasonable profit for us but also aligns closely with its perceived value to you. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 10000}
